Class TspStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.model.strategy.TspStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
SolvingStrategy
public class TspStrategy extends Object implements SolvingStrategy
The TspStrategy class implements the SolvingStrategy interface and provides a strategy for solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using a specific TSP solver.

This class leverages the TSP algorithm to compute the optimal solution for the TSP, including the best path and the associated cost. It follows the strategy design pattern to provide flexibility in the choice of solving algorithms.

Since:
2024-04-27

    Constructor
    Description
    TspStrategy()
    Constructs a new TspStrategy instance, initializing the TSP solver with a default implementation (TSP1) and preparing an empty list to store the best path.

  • Constructor Details

    • TspStrategy

      public TspStrategy()
      Constructs a new TspStrategy instance, initializing the TSP solver with a default implementation (TSP1) and preparing an empty list to store the best path.

  • Method Details

    • solve

      public void solve(CompleteGraph g)
      Solves the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using a given complete graph.

      This method employs the TSP solver to compute the optimal solution for the TSP within a fixed iteration limit. The best path and cost are then stored for retrieval.

      Specified by:
      solve in interface SolvingStrategy
      Parameters:
      g - the CompleteGraph representing the cost matrix of the graph

    • getBestPath

      public List<Integer> getBestPath()
      Retrieves the best path computed by the TSP solver.

      The best path represents the optimal order of vertices to visit to minimize the total travel cost. The path is a closed loop, returning to the starting point.

      Specified by:
      getBestPath in interface SolvingStrategy
      Returns:
      the best path as a List<Integer> of vertex indices

    • getBestCost

      public double getBestCost()
      Retrieves the best cost associated with the best path computed by the TSP solver.

      The best cost represents the total cost of the optimal route as determined by the solver.

      Specified by:
      getBestCost in interface SolvingStrategy
      Returns:
      the best cost as a double value

    • getTimeExceeded

      public boolean getTimeExceeded()
      Indicates whether the solving process exceeded the time limit.

      This implementation always returns false as the TSP solver in this strategy does not include time-based termination.

      Specified by:
      getTimeExceeded in interface SolvingStrategy
      Returns:
      false to indicate that no time limit was exceeded
